name: Trek (JikanLimited)
description:
NOTE! *its Highly recommended to download the game using the Itch.io App on the Desktop and not the website*.

Trek is a single RPG game with a story that is still developing. in the game you will be able to find and mine materials and craft different kind of weapons and find monsters and bosses and piece the story together the more you play it and finish the quests. 

The game is still not in its Full Form as there will be seasons which will be called "Expansions" that will come and add more content to the game and build up the world and build up the story till its completely finished.
